scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.android:connect: npm run android:open-ports && npm run android:no-dimming && npm run android:open
scripts.android:disconnect: npm run android:close-ports && npm run android:allow-sleep
scripts.android:open-ports: adb reverse tcp:5173 tcp:5173 && adb reverse tcp:3001 tcp:3001
scripts.android:close-ports: adb reverse --remove tcp:5173 && adb reverse --remove tcp:3001
scripts.android:no-dimming: adb shell settings put global stay_on_while_plugged_in 7 && adb shell settings put system screen_off_timeout 2147483647 && adb shell settings put system screen_brightness_mode 0 && adb shell settings put system screen_brightness 255
scripts.android:allow-sleep: adb shell settings put global stay_on_while_plugged_in 0 && adb shell settings put system screen_off_timeout 60000 && adb shell settings put system screen_brightness_mode 1
